thread.title: BRIEF-Equinix To Acquire The Infomart Dallas In $800 Million Deal

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Equinix To Acquire The Infomart Dallas In $800 Million Deal
text: February 14, 2018 / 9:17 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Equinix To Acquire The Infomart Dallas In $800 Million Deal Reuters Staff Feb 14 (Reuters) - Equinix Inc: * EQUINIX TO ACQUIRE THE INFOMART DALLAS IN $800 MILLION DEAL * EQUINIX INC - ‍EQUINIX WILL INCREASE NUMBER OF ITS OWNED ASSETS BY FOUR, INCREASING RECURRING REVENUE FROM OWNED ASSETS TO MORE THAN 45 PERCENT​ * EQUINIX - AS PART OF DEAL, ABOUT 50 INFOMART EMPLOYEES,CONTRACTORS, PRIMARILY IN OPERATIONS FUNCTIONS OF ACQUIRED FACILITY, WILL BECOME EQUINIX EMPLOYEES * EQUINIX INC - ‍ TO ACQUIRE INFOMART DALLAS FROM ASB REAL ESTATE INVESTMENTS, IN AN $800 MILLION DEBT AND CASH TRANSACTION​ * EQUINIX - ‍FINANCIAL TERMS OF DEAL INCLUDE CASH CONSIDERATION OF $31 MILLION COMBINED WITH $750 MILLION IN SENIOR UNSECURED NOTES ISSUED TO ASB Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
